column1: Baby Barnaby's////Let me start with the parking situation
column2: I will say...it could be better but I understand. The parking lot is small
column3: and if you can't make it happen
column4: street parking is your other option. Get here early
column5: it seems to stay busy (for good reason). The wait was reasonable the day we visited (maybe 20 minutes?)
column6: we signed in and then kept an ear out for our name. Service was very friendly and for the most part pretty attentive.
